channel.title: Brand New 718, Rs7Server
channel.description:
[B][FONT="Comic Sans MS"][COLOR="purple"][CENTER][SIZE="7"]Rs3 Server 317 & 718[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE="4"][URL=http://"http://rs7server.com/page/Webclient.html"]Webclient[/URL][/SIZE] [SIZE="4"][URL=http://"http://rs7server.com/"]Forums[/URL][/SIZE] [SIZE="4"][URL=http://"http://rs7server.com/Donate/index.html"]Donate[/URL][/SIZE]
[CENTER][SIZE="5"][COLOR="purple"]718[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[B][SIZE="4"][COLOR="Red"]Server Description[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] Rs3Server's 718 reversion is a Revamped server that is professionally managed by great developers, with 6 years java experience which means that We are doing our best to avoid the lags and bugs. As Rs3 has been revamped, alot of our support and player community has left, we are looking for anyone who enjoys rsps's , friendly staff and great economy to come join us today!
[B][SIZE="4"][COLOR="Red"]Combat[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] [B][I]100%[/I]Meele System [/B](Info Taken From [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki"]RSWIKI[/URL]) [B][I]100%[/I] Ranged System [/B](Info Taken From [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki"]RSWIKI[/URL]) [B][I]100% [/I]Prayer System [/B](Info Taken From [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki"]RSWIKI[/URL]) [B][I]100%[/I] Magic System[/B] (Info Taken From [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki"]RSWIKI[/URL]) [B][I]100%[/I] Hitpoints System[/B] (Info Taken From [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki"]RSWIKI[/URL]) [B][I]100%[/I] Defence System[/B] (Info Taken From [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki"]RSWIKI[/URL])
[COLOR="blue"][B]Note: EVERY WEAPON AND ARMOUR HAS IT'S RATING FROM [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki"]RSWIKI[/URL] [/B][/COLOR]
[B][SIZE="4"][COLOR="Red"]Working Skills[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Farming. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Woodcutting. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Smithing. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Crafting. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Mining. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Herblore. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Runecrafting. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Construction. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Hunter. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Fletching. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Thieving. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Firemaking. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Fishing. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Summoning. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Dungeoneering. [B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Agility.
Every skill works, so theres a lot of skilling to do on Rs3 ;-).
[B][SIZE="4"][COLOR="Red"]Minigames & Bosses[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] [I][B]100%[/B] [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Queen_Black_Dragon"]Queen Black Dragon[/URL]! [B]100%[/B] [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/God_Wars_Dungeon"]Godwars[/URL]! (Including [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Nex"]Nex[/URL] and his 4 minions!) [B]100%[/B] [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Bork"]Bork[/URL]! [B]100%[/B] [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Kalphite_Queen"]Kalphite Queen[/URL]! [B]100%[/B] [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Barrelchest"]Barrelchest[/URL]! [B]100%[/B] [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/King_Black_Dragon"]King Black Dragon[/URL] (NEWEST BLACK DRAGON!) [B]100%[/B][URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Tormented_Demon"]Tormented Demons[/URL]! [B]100%[/B][URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Corporeal_Beast"]Corporeal beast[/URL]![/I]
[U][SIZE="4"]Minigames[/SIZE][/U] [I][B]100%[/B] [COLOR="#2f4f4f"][URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Dominion_Tower"]Dominion Tower[/URL].[/COLOR] [B]100%[/B] [COLOR="#2f4f4f"][URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Pest_Control"]Pest Control[/URL].[/COLOR] [B]100%[/B] [COLOR="#2f4f4f"][URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Fight_Pit"]Fight Pits[/URL].[/COLOR] [B]100%[/B] [COLOR="#2f4f4f"][URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Castle_Wars"]Castle wars[/URL].[/COLOR] [B]100%[/B] [COLOR="#2f4f4f"][URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Clan_War"]Clan Wars[/URL].[/COLOR] [B]100%[/B] [COLOR="#2f4f4f"][URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Duel_Arena"]Duel Arena[/URL].[/COLOR] [B]100%[/B] [COLOR="#2f4f4f"][URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Barrows."]Barrows[/URL].[/COLOR] [B]100%[/B] [COLOR="#2f4f4f"][URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Mage_Arena"]Mage Arena[/URL].[/COLOR] [B]100%[/B] [COLOR="#2f4f4f"]Trivia.[/COLOR][/I]
[B][COLOR="Red"]Rs3 Server has alot of content! Get in and give it a try[/COLOR][/B]
[img]http://s9.postimg.org/68jgimurj/Nex.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s17.postimg.org/tqmgb1ykv/Home.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s18.postimg.org/k6u0qdfbt/Dom_Tower.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s27.postimg.org/jdmlh98er/Polypore.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s18.postimg.org/9dr3vlnfd/QBD.jpg[/img]
- Sincerley The Rs3 Team.[/CENTER][/FONT][/B]

item.title: Brand New 718, Rs7Server
item.dc:creator: @Rs3_Team Rs3 Team
item.description:
@Rs3_Team wrote:

[B][FONT=“Comic Sans MS”][COLOR=“purple”][CENTER][SIZE=“7”]Rs3 Server 317 & 718[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[SIZE=“4”][URL=http://“http://rs7server.com/page/Webclient.html”]Webclient[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=“4”][URL=http://“http://rs7server.com/”]Forums[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=“4”][URL=http://“http://rs7server.com/Donate/index.html”]Donate[/URL][/SIZE]

[CENTER][SIZE=“5”][COLOR=“purple”]718[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]

[B][SIZE=“4”][COLOR=“Red”]Server Description[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
Rs3Server’s 718 reversion is a Revamped server that is professionally managed by great developers, with 6 years java experience which means that We are doing our best to avoid the lags and bugs. As Rs3 has been revamped, alot of our support and player community has left, we are looking for anyone who enjoys rsps’s , friendly staff and great economy to come join us today!

[B][SIZE=“4”][COLOR=“Red”]Combat[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[B][I]100%[/I]Meele System [/B](Info Taken From [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki”]RSWIKI[/URL])
[B][I]100%[/I] Ranged System [/B](Info Taken From [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki”]RSWIKI[/URL])
[B][I]100% [/I]Prayer System [/B](Info Taken From [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki”]RSWIKI[/URL])
[B][I]100%[/I] Magic System[/B] (Info Taken From [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki”]RSWIKI[/URL])
[B][I]100%[/I] Hitpoints System[/B] (Info Taken From [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki”]RSWIKI[/URL])
[B][I]100%[/I] Defence System[/B] (Info Taken From [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki”]RSWIKI[/URL])

[COLOR=“blue”][B]Note: EVERY WEAPON AND ARMOUR HAS IT’S RATING FROM [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki”]RSWIKI[/URL] [/B][/COLOR]

[B][SIZE=“4”][COLOR=“Red”]Working Skills[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Farming.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Woodcutting.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Smithing.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Crafting.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Mining.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Herblore.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Runecrafting.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Construction.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Hunter.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Fletching.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Thieving.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Firemaking.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Fishing.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Summoning.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Dungeoneering.
[B][I]100%[/I][/B] Working Agility.

Every skill works, so theres a lot of skilling to do on Rs3 ;-).

[B][SIZE=“4”][COLOR=“Red”]Minigames & Bosses[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[I][B]100%[/B] [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Queen_Black_Dragon”]Queen Black Dragon[/URL]!
[B]100%[/B] [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/God_Wars_Dungeon”]Godwars[/URL]! (Including [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Nex”]Nex[/URL] and his 4 minions!)
[B]100%[/B] [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Bork”]Bork[/URL]!
[B]100%[/B] [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Kalphite_Queen”]Kalphite Queen[/URL]!
[B]100%[/B] [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Barrelchest”]Barrelchest[/URL]!
[B]100%[/B] [URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/King_Black_Dragon”]King Black Dragon[/URL] (NEWEST BLACK DRAGON!)
[B]100%[/B][URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Tormented_Demon”]Tormented Demons[/URL]!
[B]100%[/B][URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Corporeal_Beast”]Corporeal beast[/URL]![/I]

[U][SIZE=“4”]Minigames[/SIZE][/U]
[I][B]100%[/B] [COLOR="#2f4f4f"][URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Dominion_Tower”]Dominion Tower[/URL].[/COLOR]
[B]100%[/B] [COLOR="#2f4f4f"][URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Pest_Control”]Pest Control[/URL].[/COLOR]
[B]100%[/B] [COLOR="#2f4f4f"][URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Fight_Pit”]Fight Pits[/URL].[/COLOR]
